INSERT INTO Health_Daily_Log ( HNO, MNO, HDATE, SLEEPTIME, HWEIGHT, WATERAMOUNT, EXERCISE, FOOD ) VALUES ( #{hno}, #{mno}, TO_DATE(#{hdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
CASE WHEN #{sleeptime} IS NOT NULL AND #{sleeptime} != '' THEN TO_DATE( #{hdate} || ' ' || LPAD(SUBSTR(#{sleeptime},1,INSTR(#{sleeptime},':')-1), 2, '0') || ':' || LPAD(SUBSTR(#{sleeptime},INSTR(#{sleeptime},':')+1), 2, '0'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI' ) ELSE TO_DATE(#{hdate} || ' 00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') END,
NVL(#{hweight}, 0), NVL(#{wateramount}, 0), NVL(#{exercise}, '-'), NVL(#{food}, '-') )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Health_Daily_Log WHERE HNO = #{hno} AND MNO = #{mno}
mapper.select: SELECT hno FROM Health_Daily_Log WHERE mno = #{mno} ORDER BY HDATE DESC, HNO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Health_Daily_Log WHERE mno = #{mno} AND TRUNC(HDATE) = TO_DATE(#{hdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT HWEIGHT FROM Health_Daily_Log WHERE mno = #{mno} ORDER BY HDATE DESC, HNO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
